title: Holborn tube station
summary:
Holborn (/ˈhoʊbərn/ HOH-bə(r)n)[lower-alpha 1] is a London Underground station in Holborn, Central London, located at the junction of High Holborn and Kingsway.[8] It is served by the Central and Piccadilly lines. On the Central line the station is between Tottenham Court Road and Chancery Lane stations; on the Piccadilly line it is between Covent Garden and Russell Square and is in Travelcard Zone 1.
Close by are the British Museum, Lincoln's Inn Fields, Red Lion Square, Bloomsbury Square, London School of Economics and Sir John Soane's Museum.
